directions: In a slow cooker, combine potatoes, ham, corn, green pepper, and onion. In a small bowl, stir together soup, milk, and flour until smooth. Pour soup mixture over ham and vegetables, and stir gently to coat.
Cover, and cook on Low for about 8 hours, or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed Cheddar cheese soup
title: Corny Ham and Potato Scallop
